title: ELaunch
author: ELaunch
content: E-Launch is a protocol providing users with the possibility to create & launch their own token and initial token sale. No code och previous experience is required, simply navigate through our user-friendly platform and design your own token and token launch in just minutes. E-Launch offers multiple other features to help you with the overall token launch, such as: helping with the listing of your token, locking your LP, creating airdrops, and the possibility to stake native ELC tokens.Why E-Launch?At E-launch, our goal is to incentivize our customers to launch their projects with us by providing a secure and flexible platform at a minimal cost. Our metrics and utilities have been carefully designed to ensure that launching with us is a favorable choice when compared to other platforms.What makes us different?- One of the key factors that set us apart is our commitment to offering the most competitive rates on the market. We take pride in offering the lowest creation fees available, ensuring that our clients can launch their projects with the minimal financial burden.- We are currently offering free KYC for the first 10 projects to initiate a presale with us, with authorized KYC agents. This provides our clients with an added layer of security and transparency, helping to build trust with their investors.-Unlike many other launchpads, E-Launch does not take any percentage of your raised presale tokens. This means that there is no risk of major dumps on your project, and you can be confident that your hard work and investment will not be compromised.- We offer three staking pools, including one that provides additional benefits to our diamond holders. This allows our clients to tailor their staking strategy to their specific needs and goals, while also earning rewards for their investment.- Our platform also includes a free airdrop function, which can be used to distribute tokens to a wide range of users and promote wider adoption of your project.Finally, we offer free liquidity and token lock services, providing an additional layer of security and stability for your project. These features help to ensure that your tokens remain safe and secure, while also providing a more attractive investment opportunity for potential investors.In addition, we have a compelling roadmap and long-term plan in place to establish a strong presence in the market. Our vision includes ongoing efforts to develop and expand our ecosystem in a manner that delivers tangible benefits to our valued token holders. We are committed to creating sustained value and maintaining a strong market position through our strategic initiatives and future plans.https://www.e-launch.financehttps://t.me/elaunchofficial

comments.author: pingu39
comments.body: E-Launch is a user-friendly protocol that enables users to effortlessly create and launch their own tokens with an initial token sale, without requiring any coding or prior experience.Design your token and launch in just minutes, all at the most competitive fees in the market.This is interesting but also dangerous.Anyone can start a campaign, create a token and collect money and finally a scam.

comments.author: ELaunch
comments.body: We understand your concern about potential scams in the cryptocurrency industry. At E-Launch, we take security and transparency seriously, and we have implemented measures to ensure the safety of our platform and our users.Firstly, our team conducts due diligence on each project before they are allowed to launch on our platform. This includes verifying the identities of the project owners, reviewing their whitepapers and code in for of audits, and performing risk assessments.Secondly, we do not charge any percentage of the raised presale tokens, which means we do not have any incentive to promote scam projects.Finally, we also offer free KYC for the first 20 projects, 2023, and we encourage all users to conduct their own research before investing in any project.We are committed to providing a secure and user-friendly platform for creators to launch their projects, and we are constantly working to improve our services and safeguards.

comments.author: bangalorex
comments.body: I see the difference and benefits of E-Launch, but how are you going to compete agains ones like pinksale?I read your docs and came across the staking pools which looks very interesting but for the pools to be benefitial you will need to have people using the launchpad.I'll make sure to join your groups and stay updated. Best of luck
